features: ★【1080P Full HD Webcam】：This streaming webcam runs at 30 frames per second and 2 million pixels in HD 1080p video. The Full HD 1080P webcam with built-in advanced CMOS image sensor supplys crisp image and crystal clear video.True-to-life HD video captures the most exciting details,and picture quality is realistic and pure. You will get the most sharp, smooth video calling experience.

★ 【Dual Noise Canceling Microphone】：Computer camera with built-in microphone can automatically reduce the external background noise,make sound purer and clearer,and clearly capture your voice within 10 meters.The webcam with microphone enables you to enjoy clearer voice for hassle-free communication.

★ 【Automatic Light Correction & 90 Degree Wide-Angle Webcam 】：The usb webcam can adjust color and brightness automatically to produce brighter images that make you more attractive and beautiful in videos.This computer webcam with 90 °viewing angle to meet your needs.PC camera reduces dead angles and no optical distortion.90 °wide-angle field of view provide you with more high-definition and high-quality video experience.Widescreen webcam is great for telecommuting or multi-person chats.

★ 【Easy to Setup & Play and Plug】：1080P webcam camera is compatiable with USB 2.0. This computer web cam is easy to setup and use, just plug and play. No additional driver needed. USB Camera works with PC, Notebook, laptop, desktop, Android TV which has USB port.

★【Wide Compatibility】: USB 2.0 interface, no driver needed, just plug and play. Support for Windows XP / XP2 / Vista 32bit / Win7/8/10/11 Macbook OS / Linux or latest. Advanced H. 264 video compression technology provides excellent quality video on Skype, Facetime, OBS, XBOX ONE, Hangouts, Facebook, Youtube, Zoom, Twitter, and more.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.3 4.3 out of 5 stars 1,006 ratings 4.3 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Expected the worst and got the best!
reviews.reviewText: A couple days before a video interview for a job, I was testing my built in webcam on my laptop when it decided to die. Panicked, I quickly went to Amazon to find a replacement that was cheap because I didn't have much money (hence the looking for a job, folks). I was beyond worried because cheap rarely means good so I was very worried I made a mistake. Much to my surprise, this camera is amazing. Amazing camera quality (better than my laptop's!) And it was insanely easy to use. My laptop has a lot of stuff on it so I was worried I would have to install some random software and register it or something to use it this one time but it didn't require anything. It was ready to plug in and use within seconds. No installation, no additional software. Nothing. Immediately connected and ready to use on the software I had to use for the interview (Webx). Seriously the best value for the low price tag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works just fine
reviews.reviewText: Like it simple to use for virtual doctor appointments.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars You get what you pay for
reviews.reviewText: This camera was really cheap so I just wanted to give it a try. I have a very old Logitech C720 and wanted to compare as this camera is listed as 1080p versus the 720p of the logitech. While it does do 1080p, the actual image quality(from the sensor size and processing) is about exactly the same even when its of a higher resolution. On the plus side, the cost is extremely low. A new C720 is still 25 and I got this for less than 20. So similar image quality, higher resolution and lower price. For a budget camera its a great deal, but don't expect any miracles. Sadly just because a webcam has a higher resolution it doesn't mean the image will have good quality. The sensor sizes are just too small to catch enough light.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It worked out of the box
reviews.reviewText: My young grandson set it up himself, used it for awhile then lost interest so I don’t know how long it would have kept working. Long enough for a kid I guess

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good xbox one video camera.
reviews.reviewText: This cam works well for an xbox one s. Just make sure you are already in game when you start up the stream and camera. It works like a charm. It will have a small field of view. Plug it into your pc and you will see its actual field of view and how clear it is. Don't have a mess in the background, it has a very clear image. Good camera for the budget.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price
reviews.reviewText: It’s a cheap camera and works as advertised. However, after a few weeks of using it people started saying my microphone was acting up and it looked like I had a black eye. Camera would start being glitchy and voice would cut in and out. For a cheap quick setup that you occasionally use it works; but if you need something for everyday use spend a few extra bucks and find a better camera.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic value - excellent quality
reviews.reviewText: I hooked this up to a Surface Book 2 running Windows 11. Plug and play all the way. Picture looks great and my first video chat appeared to go off without a hitch. I was told that my audio/ video was great. Highly recommend! At this price, i am ordering a second to keep in my camera bag. Please note, it does swivel up down, but not left to right. The moni clip and a tripod mount allow you to adjust it sufficiently, and it has a decent 90 degree cam angle - so definitely not a game changer. BUY!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars The Microphone on the camera is terrible
reviews.reviewText: Sadly the return window on this camera closed a few days ago, and I only just now isolated my problem with meetings (Zoom and Google Meet) to the microphone on this web camera.The Camera is fine, but the microphone is terrible: Muffled... and it keeps lowering system volume making hard for folks to hear.The microphone on a previously purchased web camera is fine.I would stay away.
